reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Capacity building for 6-8 self organized youth and women groups in social skills gender equality ecological organic agriculture development skills value chain and market dev't study analysis market outlets and experience sharing on best practices.- It is t o benefit organized youth + women groups in ecological organic agriculture production and its marketing- Beneficiaries involving female and male youth and farmers to develop marketing skills. The beneficiaries will also develop leadership capabilities. All beneficiaries will know how to plan vegetable production without incurring high input costs using the principles of ecological organic agriculture crop rotation use of organic fertilizer and bio-pesticides. Knowledge on value chain will be developed high land fruits like apple will be developed in the value chain of the zone. Producers will have access to market-The direct beneficiaries are 281 male and female youth and farmers while 1400 persons will be indirect beneficiaries.- The co-actors are woreda bu reau of agriculture woreda administration women affairs office woreda trade + industry office Web site: ww.isd.org.et
